chapter.title: First Steps
chapter.para: The first steps require an ATmega microcontroller with an RS232 connection to an PC or a terminal like the VT100 or similar hardware. A customization may change these requirements.

sect1.title: User Interface
sect1.para:
amforth has a simple user interface. Connect your system to a serial terminal (or a PC) and you get the forth prompt >
> cold amforth 4.4 ATmega16 8000 kHz > words nr> n>r (i!) !i @i @e !e nip not s>d up! up@ ... >
